messages.subject: Re: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama for download. (not as OT anymore)
messages.msgSnippet: Ur welcome... Oh! I didn t know Bakumatsu was yaoi! Those people who are not supposed to be reading yaoi or squeamish, please do not download this title or
messages.messageBody:
Ur welcome...

Oh! I didn't know Bakumatsu was yaoi! Those people who are not
supposed to be reading yaoi or squeamish, please do not download this
title or other manga that has yaoi on it. Will fix the name of that
so that it says "yaoi" somewhere...

100% sure burai is not yaoi.. :O) But hey most of us like yaoi
anyway...

Hmmm... I've checked the server, it's telling me all the files are
online. The only thing I could think of is if someone is currently
downloading the same file as you are. Other than that I'm stumped.
Hopefully it's not a whole lot of chapters that are missing.

Well the server is telling me that the MBs for download is half-way
through so I'm not sure if it will last until the 21st. Those who are
downloading jdrama/jfilms are taking the most of the MBs so I took
them out last night. They're back online though so those people can
continue.

Finally, I plan to host the "relevant" files on a different server
after this one expires.

That's it for now... Bye...

messages.subject: Re: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama for download. (not as OT anymore)
messages.msgSnippet: It s at www.streamload.com/green_2 password is midori I paid for the hosting already should last until the 21st... I m not sure if it will last as long as the
messages.messageBody:
It's at

www.streamload.com/green_2

password is midori

I paid for the hosting already should last until the 21st... I'm not
sure if it will last as long as the 21st though, since the server is
counting the MBs that get downloaded and so far half of it has
already been used. So it may/may not last till the 21st. The
jdrama/jfilms are also back online. I plan to continuously host the
other "relevant" files though, probably through a different server
after this one expires.

Tiffany <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
Thank you Wounds for this resource:)

The other title Bakumatsu along with the Burai teaser is at the [end]
of the manga list. Be patient with the service...I got server related
messages saying "x is not available right now etc etc etc" so you may
be missing a chapter here and there and you will be informed:
ones which gave me trouble RK, Lone Wolf and Cub, Blade of the
Immortal, Mononoke Hime (haven't tried Ghost in the Shell).

The Bakumatsu... title is 0_o is yaoi...Okita is basically a young
teenage girl (in a man's body) who falls for Hijikata and fends off
advances from the other captains (Saitou included)

Burai however is not yaoi (according to other net resources...I've
only read the translations and scanlations Wounds has provided)...I
love Tokio! Burai Tokio would've been a great addition to the PMK cast!!!

messages.subject: Re: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama for download. (not as OT anymore)
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Wounds for this resource:) The other title Bakumatsu along with the Burai teaser is at the [end] of the manga list.  Be patient with the service...I
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Wounds for this resource:)

The other title Bakumatsu along with the Burai teaser is at the [end]
of the manga list. Be patient with the service...I got server related
messages saying "x is not available right now etc etc etc" so you may
be missing a chapter here and there and you will be informed:
ones which gave me trouble RK, Lone Wolf and Cub, Blade of the
Immortal, Mononoke Hime (haven't tried Ghost in the Shell).

The Bakumatsu... title is 0_o is yaoi...Okita is basically a young
teenage girl (in a man's body) who falls for Hijikata and fends off
advances from the other captains (Saitou included)

Burai however is not yaoi (according to other net resources...I've
only read the translations and scanlations Wounds has provided)...I
love Tokio! Burai Tokio would've been a great addition to the PMK cast!!!

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
There's another manga named Bakumatsu

messages.subject: Re: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama for download. (not as OT anymore)
messages.msgSnippet: First... Thanks for the suggestions... Next I guess not highly OT anymore... Since I finally got that Burai Teaser scanlation and the Shinsengumi Imon
messages.messageBody:
First... Thanks for the suggestions...

Next I guess not highly OT anymore... Since I finally got that Burai
Teaser scanlation and the Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker. It's in the
manga section. There's another manga named Bakumatsu that I added but
I don't know what it's about.

NOTE: I'm probably going to un-host the jdrama section from about
right now before I go to sleep and will put it back up sometime in
the afternoon. The only reason for this is I'd like to prioritize
those people first who wants to download manga since it's smaller
pieces and faster to download.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama available for download.
messages.msgSnippet: Lone Wolf and Cub is classic. I don t know too much about it, but Blade of the Immortal is another one probably worth the download from what I have read
messages.messageBody:
"Lone Wolf and Cub" is classic. I don't know too much
about it, but "Blade of the Immortal" is another one
probably worth the download from what I have read
about it in the past.

Kevin

messages.subject: HIGHLY OT: Manga/Jdrama available for download.
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry if this is highly off topic. Don t worry I won t post something like this anytime soon... BUT... Since I love this group so much (got so much info from
messages.messageBody:
Sorry if this is highly off topic. Don't worry I won't post something
like this anytime soon... BUT...

Since I love this group so much (got so much info from you guys) and
partly because I'd feel bad if no one used my account (no dsl), I
thought I'd let you guys know that for a couple of days I'll have
those hosted at

www.streamload.com/green_2

Password is midori

I can't really give anyone summaries as I haven't seen/read most
these myself. Sorry.. If you recognize a title that is related to the
group or would be nice to see (please e-mail me). Oh please keep this
amongst ourselves. Thanks!
